name: Verify user is able to edit Routine Vaccine

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to edit Routine Vaccine ({Vaccine Name=BCG, Producer=PT.Tonnindo Eramulya, Formulation=Lyophilised : reconstituted with excipient diluent, Doses/Target=20, Target Groups=Live Births, Coverage Expected%=70, Presentation=10, Wastage Rates(%)=20, Administration Type=ADS_0.5ml, Dilution-Syringes=ADS_0.5ml})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
Validate login button on home page
When User click on login button
Click login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Click proceed to login button: English
Then User login as "Country Admin"
User login: Country Admin
And User select "Country Admin" from "Role" in "Welcome" tab
Select value from dropdown: Country Admin, Role
Wait for time: 2
And User click on "Apply" button
Click on button: Apply
And User click on "Programme Data" tab
Click on tab: Programme Data
And User wait for "2" seconds
Wait for time: 2
Given User click on "Edit Routine Vaccine" button for "Programme Data"
Click on button programme data: Edit Routine Vaccine
And "Edit routine vaccination" heading is visible
Validate is heading visible: Edit routine vaccination
And User select "BCG" from "Vaccine Name" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: BCG, Vaccine Name
And User select "PT.Tonnindo Eramulya" from "Producer" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: PT.Tonnindo Eramulya, Producer
And User select "Lyophilised : reconstituted with excipient diluent" from "Formulation" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: Lyophilised : reconstituted with excipient diluent, Formulation
And User enter "20" in "dosesTarget"
Enter text in textbox: 20, dosesTarget
And User select "Live Births" from "Target Groups" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: Live Births, Target Groups
And User enter "70" in "coverageExpected"
Enter text in textbox: 70, coverageExpected
And User select "10" from "Presentation" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: 10, Presentation
And User enter "20" in "wastageRates"
Enter text in textbox: 20, wastageRates
And User select "ADS_0.5ml" from "Administration Type" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: ADS_0.5ml, Administration Type
And User select "ADS_0.5ml" from "Dilution-Syringes" in "Programme Data" tab
Select value from dropdown programme data: ADS_0.5ml, Dilution-Syringes
When User click on "Update" button
Click on button: Update
Then Routine Vaccine Data is updated successfully
Validate updated message displayed
And User wait for "10" seconds
Wait for time: 10
And Routine Vaccine producer "PT.Tonnindo Eramulya" is visible in Routine Vaccination table to user

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given User click on "Edit Routine Vaccine" button for "Programme Data"
And "Edit routine vaccination" heading is visible
And User select "<Vaccine Name>" from "Vaccine Name" in "Programme Data" tab
And User select "<Producer>" from "Producer" in "Programme Data" tab
And User select "<Formulation>" from "Formulation" in "Programme Data" tab
And User enter "<Doses/Target>" in "dosesTarget"
And User select "<Target Groups>" from "Target Groups" in "Programme Data" tab
And User enter "<Coverage Expected%>" in "coverageExpected"
And User select "<Presentation>" from "Presentation" in "Programme Data" tab
And User enter "<Wastage Rates(%)>" in "wastageRates"
And User select "<Administration Type>" from "Administration Type" in "Programme Data" tab
And User select "<Dilution-Syringes>" from "Dilution-Syringes" in "Programme Data" tab
When User click on "Update" button
Then Routine Vaccine Data is updated successfully
And User wait for "10" seconds
And Routine Vaccine producer "<Producer>" is visible in Routine Vaccination table to user
